Package ch.pschatzmann.stocks.strategy

Class OptimizedStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.stocks.strategy.OptimizedStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITradeEvent, ITradingStrategy, IOptimizableTradingStrategy

    public class OptimizedStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements IOptimizableTradingStrategy, ITradeEvent
    Performs an optimization for the indicated period. Alternatively we can run the optimization on the indicated schedule intervals
    Author:
    pschatzmann
